name: Islannection
description:
[This game was made during Lost Relic Games - GAME JAM in 3 or 4 days]

Controls:
Arrow keys to move the camera;
Mouse ScrollWheel to zoom;
Left-click to add a block.

It's a far cry from the original idea, it's too bad folks, I didn't have much time this week to work on it. But I liked the project and I intend to continue one day.

This version you are playing nothing happens, you just connect the blocks.

The plan was that as you created the land it would become populated with animals and humans. a catastrophic timer would be your challenge not to lose everything.
